pages.text: First locate some suspicious sand and break it with your hands. $(br)These contain some basic items. $(br)Collect a good amount of everything. $(br)They usually generate in weathered sand clumps.

pages.title: Basic Tree Seeds
pages.text: Make sure you get both oak and spruce! Both have unique uses.

pages.title: Cobblestone
pages.text: You can also get cobblestone from Suspicious Sand breaking.

pages.title: Sticks
pages.text: Looks like punching a block to get wood isn't out of the question

pages.title: Clay Ball
pages.text: An abundant and easily moldable material

pages.title: Origin Point
pages.text: This block sets World Spawn to where you place it. $(br)I highly recommended to obtain one of these and place it somewhere safe and out of the rain!
